reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and cozy like a sweater, with a perfect oversized fit that can be dressed up or worn casually. They appreciate its soft material and consider it a wonderful autumn or winter dress, with one customer noting it's great for all-day wear or evening wear. Customers find the dress flattering, with one mentioning its empire waist cut, and they like its warmth, with one noting it works well in Texas fall and winter weather. The material thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers describing it as thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just found my Thanksgiving outfit!
items.body: I bought this green sweater dress in a size small to wear for Friendsgiving and holiday events this fall. I’m 5'4" and 125 pounds, and the fit is perfect. It’s fitted through the top with a little flare at the bottom that gives my athletic frame a waist and a really flattering shape. The v-neck is modest but still low enough to be flattering without feeling revealing. The fabric is the a soft ribbed material. It feels cozy like a sweater but has the lighter weight of a shirt, so it’s comfortable for indoor events or mild fall weather. It isn’t see-through, and the color is a bit less vibrant in person than online, leaning toward an earthy green. I still really like it. Pros: • Soft ribbed fabric that feels cozy but lightweight • Flattering fit through the waist with a gentle flare • V-neck that’s modest but still flattering • Comfortable thickness for indoor gatherings or warmer climates • True to size and fits perfectly on an athletic build Cons: • The green is slightly less vibrant in person, but still very pretty (not even a real con) Verdict: 5 stars and it's going to be my Thanksgiving outfit! Flattering, soft, and perfect for any fall event. I’m pairing it with knee-high boots and keeping it for sure. It's one of those pieces I’m genuinely excited about. And I scour reviews before buying things, so I hope I can pay it forward and help someone else!! Read more
items.author: Useful University | Julia & Marc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sweater dress!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This sweater dress is so comfortable and flattering. The ribbed fabric has a nice stretch without being flimsy, and the fit is easy while still giving some shape at the waist. The length is perfect with tights and boots, and the V-neck is just the right depth. It’s warm enough for cooler weather but not too heavy. I’ve worn it out and also casually and it works for both. Super cute, easy piece to throw on and go. Would definitely buy this in another color. Read more
items.author: k.bellah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: I absolutely love this dress, it is so comfortable, I received many compliments the first time I wore it. It’s so cozy and it has pockets. The fit is vey flattering. Great price point! Not sheer but lightweight enough for Florida “winter”. Looks great styled with boots or flats, love the color I purchased as well!! Read more
items.author: Tara Hardy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy!
items.body: The fabric is soft and it fits comfortably! It’s a wonderful autumn or winter dress. I pair it with leggings and cute shoes/boots. The cut isn’t the best for my shape, but that doesn’t bother me much because I feel comfortable wearing it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy
items.body: This dress is super cute. I found it works well with the days where it’s warmer during the day and cooler at night. The material isn’t overly thick and the sizing is pretty true. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress - great value!
items.body: Super cute and comfortable dress.. looks so cute with leggings and boots! Washes well and is soft! Read more
items.author: CK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable and true to size
items.body: Love the dress! Has deep pockets. Very soft and comfortable. True to size. The fit is perfect. Not too thin or thick. Read more
items.author: Angie Gillespie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable.
items.body: Adorable! I got this in medium and it fits nicely. 5’4” tall and 135 lbs. It skims without being tight, and the length is perfect for me. I tend to be long waisted, so an extra inch in the bodice would have been perfect, but it’s good overall. It lost one star because I chose the black with plaid skirt, and the skirt is a different material. I thought it was a light sweater dress overall, but only the solid colors are. I do really like it, though, and overall it’s a cute dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, S-orange Stripe, T-green Grey Plaid, T-greyblue Orange Floral, Apricot, T-red Black Plaid, Black, T-yellow Brown Plaid, Red, T-tie Dye Navyfloral, Khaki, Pink, T-leopard, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
